title: The Bet
description: Abby is a good girl. She worked hard to help out her family and now she is working hard to do well in college as a older student at 24. The weekend before college starts back, her roommate Essie proposes that they go out and have a crazy night on the town.Abby decides to accept the bet and meets a handsome stranger named Carson, who is not all that he seems. They spend a passionate night together but Abby is not sure if he is good for her life. Abby is shocked when she later finds out who Carson really is and she wonders what effect the bet is going to have on her life.'The Bet' is the first book in 'The Professor's Student' series. This series is smoking hot and sexy and lovers or erotic romance novella's will love this short story.
author: Helen    Cooper
